name: data-card-27
effect: Records the total time spent in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the total time spent in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.black_white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how much time you’ve spent in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how much time you’ve spent in the Pokéathlon.
